title: Decline a Low Purchase Offer
description: A seller has received an unacceptably low offer on their property and wants to reject it without countering.

tasks.description: Confirm with the seller that they wish to reject the offer outright.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets clear instruction from the seller client to reject.

tasks.description: Formally reject the offer in writing by checking the 'rejected' box on the offer form and having the seller sign.
tasks.expected_outcome: The offer document is marked as rejected and signed by the seller.

tasks.description: Return the signed rejection to the buyer's agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: The official rejection is sent to the buyer's agent.
